reviewText: You never get tired of the same story: finding love. Th only but, sometimes subtitles showed way ahead of the dialog.

Great movies. I highly recommend them. Very fun and entertaining. Five stars for the movies!! Confused about the 2 star rating... Well I wasn't allowed to explain that so had to just review the movies. Worth watching!!
Movies were delivered in no time and the movies were great! If you know anything aboit the Bear community, this will hit home and make you LOL.

the first movie was great in introducing some alternative couples and lifestyles although the main two that fell in love weren't bears.  The second movie was better in dealing with the actual Bear attraction and love.
Worth the money!  Bring a bunch of friends over to watch it! And get your GROWL on with the bears!
It was a good and funny movie with a good twist and the bears were really hot lots of cameos
My friends and I really enjoyed these two movies. A comical romp with a fun group of bears as they navigate the challenges of relationships, stereotypes and community.
Its a very funny movies with a good edition. Subtitles in many languages: Spanish, Portuguese, Italian.... Blu Ray All zones

Ok so I'm totally biased for this story line.  But you should see them.
Thanks for reading my review.
Excellent DVD, well written and very insightful.

I'm really fond of this series, especially the cast.  There are lots of relatable stories: bigger guys struggling with body image, couples struggling with boundaries, younger men who don't know where they belong in the community. It's funny, it's serious when it needs to be, and it's got  lots of heart.  Lots of familiar faces pop up as cameos.  Having never been to the event in person, it's fun experiencing Bear Week in Provincetown vicariously through the second movie.
Great movies, although I liked the first one better than the first one. The movies arrived in a timely manner and the packaging protected the movies properly.
Loved these movies and the double blue ray disc. If you love bears and the idea of falling in love, you will enjoy this two disc movie.
